subject: Mathematics - Operator Algebras
Mathematics - Functional Analysis
creator: Joi≈£a, Maria
Munteanu, Radu-B.
Zarakas, Ioannis
title:
Multipliers of Hilbert pro-C*-bimodules and crossed products by Hilbert
  pro-C*-bimodules
description:
In this paper we introduce the notion of multiplier of a Hilbert pro-$C^{\ast
}$-bimodule and we investigate the structure of the multiplier bimodule of a
Hilbert pro-$C^{\ast}$-bimodule. We also investigate the relationship between
the crossed product $A\times _{X}\mathbb{Z}$ of a pro-$% C^{\ast }$-algebra $A$
by a Hilbert pro-$C^{\ast }$-bimodule $X$ over $A$, the crossed product
$M(A)\times _{M(X)}\mathbb{Z}$ of the multiplier algebra $M(A)$ of $A$ by the
multiplier bimodule $M(X)$ of $X$ and the multiplier algebra $M(A\times
_{X}\mathbb{Z})$ of $A\times _{X}\mathbb{Z}$.

Comment: To appear in Operators and Matrices. arXiv admin note: text overlap
  with arXiv:1410.7823
